Contributor.Organization: Vaccine Research Institute of San Diego

Sample.Title: RDE2_X3339_FlightvsGround_F11_LB_7DS515_1

Channel.Source: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium X3339 total RNA after microgravity in flight F11
Channel.Characteristics: Salmonella typhimurium X3339 total RNA harvested after exposure to space flight
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: incorporation of Cy3-dCTP with Reverse Transcriptase

Channel.Source: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium X3339 gDNA from overnight cultures in LB
Channel.Characteristics: Salmonella typhimurium X3339 grown O/N in LB at 37C with aeration
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: incorporation of Cy5-dCTP with Klenow enzyme

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: overnight hyb on Corning UltraGAPS slides at 42°C in 25% formamide / 5xSSC / 0.1% BSA
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Perkin Elmer ScanArray 5000 scanner, image acquisition with ScanArray Express 3.0.1 software, spot quantification using Quantarray 3.0 software, adaptive quantification, protocol STv7S_01_051201
Sample.Description: biological replicate, Date of Scan Thu Dec 07 12:26:13 2006
Sample.Data-Processing: normalized based on total signal for each channel, background subtracted VALUE data obtained from log of normalized background subtracted ch1/ch2 signal.

Column.Name: CH1_SIGNAL_NOISE_RATIO_FILTER
Column.Description: Channel 1 signal to noise ratio filter

Column.Name: CH2_SIGNAL_NOISE_RATIO_FILTER
Column.Description: Channel 2 signal to noise ratio filter

Column.Name: PRE-VALUE
Column.Description: ch1 % of total / ch2 % of total

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: log of ch1 % of total / ch2 % of total

Channel.Label: Cy5

Sample.Scan-Protocol: Perkin Elmer ScanArray 5000 scanner, image acquisition with ScanArray Express 3.0.1 software, spot quantification using Quantarray 3.0 software, adaptive quantification, protocol STv7S_01_051201; only the first two subarrays were scanned

Data were extracted for only two subarrays - duplicated second subarray data for processing and uploading to GEO - second and third subarray therefore have identical numbers.

Series.Title: Salmonella Typhimurium transcription profiles in space flight
Series.Summary: Salmonella transcription profiles were obtained from samples flown on space shuttle mission STS-115, and compared to profiles from Salmonella grown under identical conditions on the ground. Keywords: stress response, transcriptional profile
Series.Overall-Design: Triplicate experimental samples were hybridized to slides that contain three identical Salmonella ORF arrays. Each hybridization was performed with Cy3 labeled total RNA and Cy5 labeled gDNA as control.
